name: Google I/O Extended 2017 Jogjakarta Recap

venue.name: Entrepreneur Development Service
venue.address_1: Jl. Asem Kranji Blok K-7 Sekip

description:
Google I/O Extended 2017 Jogjakarta Recap is a day of inspirational talks and codelabs about Google's latest developer products released recently held Google I/O 2017 at Mountain View, California.

To inspire people to be able to innovate and to create, GDG Jogjakarta wants to share the latest technology from Google, share stories, and also network and mingle with the community.

We will invite these mentors to give talks and technical workshops on Kotlin: 

1. Deny Prasetyo, Kotlin and Container Technology Enthusiast (linkedin)

2. Pratama Wijaya, Kotlin User Group Indonesia - @KotlinID (linkedin)

Please bring your laptop / notebook with these installed:

1. Android Studio

2. Kotlin compiler

Note: We have a limit of 30 slot attendees. So we're selecting members by your answers and confirmation of attendance. Members in the waiting list, you still have a chance of attending :)

name: GDG DevFest Jogjakarta 2017 #UbahDenganKode

venue.name: STMIK Akakom
venue.address_1: Jl. Raya Janti No. 143, Karang Jambe, Banguntapan, Bantul, Daerah Istimewa Yogyakarta 55918

description:
GDG DevFest Jogjakarta 2017: #UbahDenganKode

This year, the biggest Google tech-conference in Indonesia by Google Developer Group (GDG) Communities comes with a spirit of solving problems and creating solutions.

To equip you with the skills and knowledge you need to change the world with code, we have crafted talks and codelabs all about Android, Web, Cloud, and Google latest technology from the experts.

Save the date, Yogyakarta!

Date: Sunday, November 26, 2017

Place: STMIK AKAKOM Yogyakarta, Jl. Raya Janti No. 143

NOTE: Please register on these forms below. RSVP on this meetup page will NOT guarantee your eligibility to attend the event, unless you fill the forms! :)

DEV TALKS

Time: 09.00 - 16.00

REGISTER HERE: http://bit.ly/DevFestJog17-Talks

CODELABS SESSIONS

Time: 16.00 - 18.00

• Codelabs : From Java to Kotlin & Progressive Web Apps

• Mobile Sites Certification

You can register either to participate in the Codelabs or take a Mobile Sites Certification exam

REGISTER HERE: http://bit.ly/DevFestJog17-Codelabs

---

After registering on the link, we will send you a confirmation email for your attendance via email latest by Friday, 24 November 2017.

Only participants with a confirmation email can join into the sessions.

See you!

#GDGJogjakarta #DevFest2017 #GDGIndonesia

name: Web Study Jam Jogjakarta - Mobile Sites Certification (Batch #1)
description:
Please register with this link: http://bit.ly/WebStudyJamJogja

Mobile now accounts for over half of all web traffic. Users expect their small-screen experiences to be as quick and intuitive as those on desktop. But making the mobile web fast and easy takes some special skills. 53% of mobile visitors will leave if a page takes more than three seconds to load. The average page takes 22 seconds to load, so collectively we're losing a lot of mobile users and giving them a bad experience along the way. Speed is only one part of the picture when creating great mobile experiences.

• What is a Study Jam?
Many people learn better when they learn in groups. Study Jams are community-run study groups for developers covering a range of Google Developers content. Typically, Study Jams focus on completing a course, but some may focus on mastering a skill or product area.
The Study Jams objective is to raise the technical proficiency of global community members through the highest possible course completion rate.

During this event, our Facilitators will guide and teach you the concepts. After the lessons, participants will take the FREE CERTIFICATION EXAM from Google. Participants that complete the exam will receive a printable Google certificate to verify status as a certified mobile sites professional.

In this Study Jam, you will be facilitated by our 3 great facilitators: Manda, Maul, and Trista.

• Participants requirements:
- Bring your laptop (with your own internet connection is better)
- Have at least basic HTML/CSS/Javascript knowledge

Please register with this link: http://bit.ly/WebStudyJamJogja

• Important to know
All batches in the Web Study Jam events are the same. You do not need to attend more than one batch for certification. choose according to the time you can attend.

name: Google I/O Extended 2018 Recap Jogjakarta
description:
PLEASE REGISTER IN HERE

Talks: http://bit.ly/io18JogjaTalks
Codelabs: http://bit.ly/io18JogjaCodelabs

-------------------------------------------------
Google I/O Extended 2018 Recap Jogjakarta is back!
What's Next from Google?

Google I/O is an annual developer-focused conference held by Google in San Francisco, California. Google I/O features highly technical, in-depth sessions focused on building web, mobile, and enterprise applications with Google and open web technologies.

In Google I/O Extended 2018 Recap Jogjakarta, we will have discussions from all range of topics; such as Flutter, Android Jetpack, and Machine Learning from the experts in the field.

The sessions will then close with Flutter Codelabs (available for selected participants).

Speakers
Ibnu Sina Wardy
Google Developer Expert for Android

Himang Sharatun
R&D Developer Skyshi

Randy Arba Pahlevi
Co-founder Ramein.id

When
Saturday, July 7th, 2017
Talks: 12.30 - 16.45 WIB
Codelabs: 16.45 - 18.00 WIB

Place
Ruang Inspirasi, Innovative Academy Hub
Bulaksumur H6, UGM YK, Caturtunggal, Depok Sub-District, Sleman Regency, Special Region of Yogyakarta
(Map URL http://ugm.id/IAhub)

Register here! Seat are limited!
Talks: http://bit.ly/io18JogjaTalks
Codelabs: http://bit.ly/io18JogjaCodelabs

name: Next '18 Extended Jogjakarta
description:
PLEASE REGISTER IN HERE !!
https://bit.ly/next18jogja

--------------------------------------------------------
The Google Cloud Next '18 conference just concluded in San Francisco (from Jul 24-27) bringing together experts partners and customers of Google Cloud products to share ideas and make the cloud stronger and more productive for everyone.

The "Next 18 Extended" events bring those ideas and experience to communities with local events that cover key announcements and provide hands-on learning opportunities.

Next 18 Extended Jogjakarta will discuss the latest cloud technology, such as kubernetes on Google Cloud, ML Kit, machine learning or related data science.

Speakers
Dhomas Hatta Fudholi, Ph.D
Lecturer, Universitas Islam Indonesia

Arif Nur Khoirudin
Software Development Engineer at Accelbyte

Randy Arba Pahlevi
Co-founder Ramein.id

Topics
Knowledge: to Gather and to Enrich (Ontologi)
Microservices Deployment with Kubernetes and Docker
ML Kit on Mobile Apps

Time
Sunday, September 16th, 2018
09.00 - 15.00 WIB

Place
EDS Building
Jl. Asem Kranji Blok K-7 Depok,
Sleman, DI Yogyakarta
(Map URL ugm.id/EDSBuilding)

Get $55 voucher to learn about Google Cloud technologies and get Online Badge to proof your proficiency using Cloud technology.

Register now! Limited Seat!
https://bit.ly/next18jogja

What to bring?
Laptop, charger, Internet Connection

name: DevFest 2018 Jogjakarta
description:
Terima kasih untuk antusias teman-teman untuk ikut serta di acara DevFest. Karena jumlah pendaftar yang luar biasa dan kursi yang terbatas terpaksa kami melakukan seleksi dan mengirim konfirmasi kehadiran.

Untuk teman-teman yang telah mengisi form konfirmasi, kami telah mengirimkan email reminder. Untuk teman-teman yang telah menerima email tersebut dipersilahkan untuk hadir.

Ada beberapa hal terkait isu email seperti email yang masuk di kolom updates, promosi atau bahkan spam. Hal tersebut diluar kemampuan kami. Preferensi setiap pengguna berbeda beda, asumsi kami karena Gmail yang telah menerapkan machine learning.

Sekali lagi kami mohon maaf, semoga kita bisa bertemu di event GDG Jogjakarta selanjutnya.

Jabat erat,
Tim GDG Jogjakarta
--------------------------------------------

GDG Jogjakarta berkolaborasi dengan GBG Jogjakarta mengadakan event BizFest x DevFest 2018 Jogjakarta. Event ini tidak hanya membicarakan tentang teknologi dan koding untuk developer tetapi juga tentang bisnis dan entrepreneur.

Melalui event Inilah Anda dapat memahami inovasi dan teknologi terbaru dari Google dan bagaimana menggunakannya secara strategis untuk bisnis, startup, maupun pekerjaan sehari-hari.

BizFest x DevFest 2018 hadir dalam bentuk seminar, codelabs, dan workshop untuk membawa bisnis, startup dan pekerjaan sehari-hari kamu ke level yang lebih tinggi.

Waktu
Sabtu, 1 Desember, 2018
09.00 - 18.00 WIB

Tempat
University Club Hotel UGM
Jl. Pancasila No. 2, Boulevard UGM, Bulaksumur, Yogyakarta, Senolowo, Sinduadi, Mlati, Kota Yogyakarta, Daerah Istimewa Yogyakarta 55281

Topik
- Digital Wellbeing
- Google Cloud Platform
- Progressive Web Apps
- Business / Entrepreneur Talks
- Google My Business
- Modularize Your Existing Android Apps
- Machine Learning / Data Science
- Deep Dive SEO (Search Engine Optimisation)
- G Suite
- Kubernetes dan GCP
- Codelabs: Flutter Study Jam
- Codelabs: Modern Web/PWA

Pembicara
- Arif Qodari, Data Scientist at Ruangguru
- Fadli Wilihandarwo, GBG Jogjakarta Manager
- Fajar Sinteniki, SEO Expert
- Guntur Sarwohadi, GDG Jogjakarta Manager
- Ibnu Sina Wardi, Google Developer Expert for Android
- Maria Tjahjadi, VP of Data at Tiket.com
- Randy Arba Pahlevi, Flutter Developer
- Mirza Chilman Garin, Software Engineer at Accelbyte
- Elyas Nur Kholik, Digital Strategist at PapanAtas
- Rizal Kasim, CEO Ceraproduction.com
- Kartika Puspitasari, People Strategy Manager at tiket.com
- Dan masih banyak lagi...

Acara ini gratis, yuk registrasi sekarang! Jumlah peserta terbatas!

NB:
- Kami akan mengirimkan email konfirmasi h-4 sebelum event
- Jika kamu berhalangan hadir dimohon untuk "unjoin" beri kesempatan peserta lain yang ingin hadir.
